doc:
John Doman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Doman 0 John Doman (born January 9, 1945) is an American actor best known for playing Deputy Police Commissioner/ Major William Rawls on HBO series The Wire from 2002 to 2008, Colonel Edward Galson on Oz in 2001, Rodrigo Borgia in the international television series Borgia from 2011 to 2014, and Don Carmine Falcone in Fox's show Gotham in 2014. John_Doman ( born January_9_,_1945 ) is an_American_actor best_known for playing Deputy_Police_Commissioner / Major_William_Rawls on HBO_series The_Wire from 2002 to 2008 , Colonel_Edward_Galson on Oz in 2001 , Rodrigo_Borgia in the_international_television_series_Borgia from 2011 to 2014 , and Don_Carmine_Falcone in Fox 's_show_Gotham in 2014 .
